1. The block below is shown on an orthophoto. Calculate the area of the 
block in metres squared. 
(5)
2. The block below is shown on an orthophoto. Calculate the area of the 
block in kilometres squared. 
(5)
[10]
Answers to activity 5.4
1. A = L × B3
 
L: 4,4 cm × 100 = 440 m3
 
B: 1,1 cm × 100 = 110 m3
 
A: 440 × 110 = 48 400 m²33 
(5)
2. A = L × B3
 
L: 1,1 cm × 0,1 = 0,11 km3
 
B: 1,1 cm × 0,1 = 0,11 km3
 
A: 0,11 × 0,11 = 0,0121 km²33 
(5)
[10]
